notes.author: Dr. Intensivist
notes.content:
Admit from ED. Hypoxic, febrile.
Lactate elevated at 4.5.
Plan: Zosyn started. Maintenance fluids at 75cc/hr. Monitor BP.

ground_truth.explanation: Elevated Lactate (>4) and hypotension requires 30mL/kg bolus resuscitation immediately, not just maintenance fluids.
